text:
@realDonaldTrump And u called a CORONAVIRUS a Hoax?!

Asked if we could inject patients with POISINOUS household cleanser like LYSOL or CLOROX as a cure?  

And said you’d have a plan to replace Obamacare ...NOPE

Said ur gonna build a wall along Mexican border and have them pay for it.
